Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Maxmax
Message: Much appreciated

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation.

Author: Maxmax
Message: Cool project.

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: Maxmax
Message: I do, quite simple but effective ones

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Maxmax
Message: Yep

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Maxmax
Message: Hello there!

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: Maxmax
Message: I'm quite okay, what about you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing alright too thanks. What are you up to today?

Author: Maxmax
Message: Not much. Writing a few commissions, and after that playing Warhammer.

Author: Andrew
Message: I've never played this game. I've heard of it though. What kind of commissions are you writing?

Author: Maxmax
Message: Oh, I've a few on work right now. Some fan fictions, and some others for friends. I like to write stories with the right idea. And about Warhammer, it's a strategic turn based game. Pretty nice.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh I see, that sounds very cool, I'm not much of a writer myself. Is Warhammer kind of like Age of Empires then? I liked those games.

Author: Maxmax
Message: Oh no no. It's a tabletop game, with dice and all. And awesome! Who did you like to use in Age of Empires?

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh ok! To be honest I don't remember that game enough to answer you. I played it a while ago.

Author: Maxmax
Message: Oh, I see. Any game that you played lately?

Author: Andrew
Message: I often play Minecraft, and I've been really into the new Mass Effect lately.

Author: Maxmax
Message: Minecraft is awesome. I heard that the new Mass Effect isn't worthy the time. It's noting like the old trilogy

Author: Andrew
Message: I think it was pretty good overall actually. But it had some very annoying glitches and bad animations. They are slowly fixing all of that though.

Author: Maxmax
Message: After five years where I craved the game I was hoping for more. Who did you date back to the old trilogy?

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah I know what you mean. I dated multiple characters actually. Who did you date?

Author: Maxmax
Message: Who was your favourite among them? And for me it was Liara. She was the best mechanic.

Author: Andrew
Message: I really loved Tali. She was adorable in her own way, and very sensible. I liked Liara too though, and Garrus.

Author: Maxmax
Message: Ahah. I did like Tali myself. I hated Ashley and Miranda. Garrus was the best friend I wished to have.

Author: Andrew
Message: I didn't like Miranda at first, but as I got to know her I started to like her more.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to (This is not your final answer)

Author: Maxmax
Message: Oki. Nice chat about old games anyway, ahah

Author: Maxmax
Message: I'd go for AI, if I can dare to

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll start the next conversation. Andrew will begin and then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Maxmax
Message: Yes

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Maxmax
Message: Hello to you!

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: Maxmax
Message: I'm quite fine, thank you. A bit hyped for the new Alien movie which is coming in May, but apart from that all's good. What about you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing quite alright too thanks! I didn't know another Alien movie was coming out though, I hope it will be good.

Author: Maxmax
Message: Yeah, It comes out during May! I think the middle of May. Anyhow, how is it going for you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm a bit bored right now, considering playing games or something.

Author: Maxmax
Message: Hey, thank you for the consideration! And games are always a great idea to kill bore. Also reading helps. Do you enjoy reading books?

Author: Andrew
Message: Sorry I didn't mean that you're the one boring me. Just in general. I do sometimes read books yeah, not as often as I'd like too I'm afraid. I don't feel like I've got enough time.

Author: Maxmax
Message: No worries. And true, reading takes time, but so does gaming! Which books would you enjoy? Horrors or Fantasy... Same for games! What's the gameplay you prefer?

Author: Andrew
Message: I tend to like RPGs and City Builders. As for books, I like fantasy more than anything, and Science Fiction too. Things that can make you feel like you're traveling far away in a different world.

Author: Maxmax
Message: Mass effect, the old trilogy, would mix everything in a great game experience. Travelling, bit of building, lots of exploring and a ton of RPG elements. Plus, many lovely characters to romance with

Author: Andrew
Message: I don't remember Mass Effect having any building gameplay, but it's definitely one of my favorite game series. Mostly for the fantastic characters.

Author: Maxmax
Message: You could build up your ship in the third and second. Even keeping pets around your floor. And true. Chars were awesome. Loved the mechanic, Liara. I romanced her all the time. So shy but lovely. You?

Author: Andrew
Message: I romanced most characters I think, but my first one was Tali. She was always so adorable and kinda mysterious. That and I loved her story, with the geths.

Author: Maxmax
Message: Did she die in your ME 3 experience? To a friend of mine she suicided, never had it.

Author: Moderator

Author: Maxmax
Message: Okay, let me ponder for a second... I'd go for person.

Author: Moderator
Message: Is this your final answer? Human in the first conversation, Artificial Intelligence in the second?

Author: Maxmax
Message: Eh, damn it. No, Ill stick with first option I gave. AI first and Person second.

Author: Maxmax
Message: Sorry, now I'm sure of it.
